bibl.title: Anchors of the Alexandrian Littoral.
bibl.note: Results of the ""Greek Mission"" off the Alexandrian littoral. - A large composite Graeco-Roman anchor. - An iron anchor. - Two elongated ""Red Sea"" stone anchors. - Medieval fishermen's anchors. - Anchorage ""en chapelet"". - Fishing tackle off Geziret el-Kur - Miami Island, Sidi Bishr.

bibl.title: Alexandria under the Mediterranean. Archaeological Studies in Memory of Honor Frost

bibl.seg: Harry Tzalas, Anchors of the Alexandrian Littoral.
Georges Soukiassian (ed.), Alexandria under the Mediterranean. Archaeological Studies in Memory of Honor Frost = Ã‰tudes Alexandrines. 36 (Alexandrie, 2015) pp. 103-113, 11 figg. n./bl. et coul.

Results of the ""Greek Mission"" off the Alexandrian littoral. - A large composite Graeco-Roman anchor. - An iron anchor. - Two elongated ""Red Sea"" stone anchors. - Medieval fishermen's anchors. - Anchorage ""en chapelet"". - Fishing tackle off Geziret el-Kur - Miami Island, Sidi Bishr.
